forge.ethyr.io.action module¶

class forge.ethyr.io.action.Action(world, entity, config)¶

Bases: object

IO class used for interacting with game actions

Used via .next to turn the complex action tree into a flat list of action and argument selections.

static actions(root=<class 'forge.blade.io.action.static.Action'>)¶

Returns only selection nodes

atnArgs¶

Final chosed action argument pair

batch()¶

Internal batcher for lists of actions

static flat(root=<class 'forge.blade.io.action.static.Action'>)¶

Returns a flat action tree

static leaves(root=<class 'forge.blade.io.action.static.Action'>)¶

Returns only the action leaves

next(env, ent, atn, outs=None)¶

Compute the available choices for the next action

Parameters

  • env – the environment observation

  • ent – the entity selecting actions

  • atn – the previously selected action

  • outs – the logit packets from selecting the previous action

Returns

the next arguments for selection done: whether we have reached the end of the selection tree

Return type

args

outs¶

The logit packets from intermediate selection

serialize(iden)¶

Internal action serializer for communication across machines

unbatch(idxTensor, keyTensor, lenTensor)¶

Internal inverse batcher

class forge.ethyr.io.action.ActionArgs(action=None, args=None)¶

Bases: object
